about: My name is Vinicius Soranço I have 21 years old, I am a developer with 3 years of experience. Half of this time I`ve dedicated myself to Web and Mobile development using technologies like ReactJS, React Native, Gatsby, NodeJS, among others. Enthusiastic of this cited Javascript Stack. The V(Vinicius) S(Soranço)Coding (No copyright intended @MS) appears with the idea of learning this beautiful tech called GatsbyJS, allied to that I wanted to show all projects I`ve been involved in an easy way.
